verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] request a package of $ 15 billion in spending cuts from Congress , including some $ 7 billion from the Children 's Health Insurance Program championed by Democrats .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: request] [ARG1: a package of $ 15 billion in spending cuts from Congress , including some $ 7 billion from the Children 's Health Insurance Program championed by Democrats] .

President Donald Trump will request [ARG2: a package of $ 15 billion in spending cuts from Congress] , [V: including] [ARG1: some $ 7 billion from the Children 's Health Insurance Program championed by Democrats] .

President Donald Trump will request a package of $ 15 billion in spending cuts from Congress , including some $ 7 billion from [ARG1: the Children 's Health Insurance Program] [V: championed] [ARG0: by Democrats] .
